:v: ocfnash can now approve this pull request. To approve and merge a pull request, simply reply with `bors r+`. More detailed instructions are available [here](https://bors.tech/documentation/getting-started/#reviewing-pull-requests).

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/10611148572/job/29410056550)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/10611148572/job/29410057210)

```suggestion
/-- If each point of the space has a neighborhood from the family `S`,
then the topology is generated by its restrictions to the sets of `S`. -/
lemma of_nhds (h : ∀ x, ∃ s ∈ S, s ∈ 𝓝 x) : RestrictGenTopology S :=
  of_continuous_prop fun _f hf ↦ continuous_iff_continuousAt.2 fun x ↦
    let ⟨s, hsS, hsx⟩ := h x
    (hf s hsS).continuousAt hsx

/-- A weakly locally compact space is compactly generated. -/
lemma isCompact_of_weaklyLocallyCompact [WeaklyLocallyCompactSpace X] :
    RestrictGenTopology {K : Set X | IsCompact K} :=
  of_nhds exists_compact_mem_nhds
```

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat: the space of continuous maps is complete if the target is complete
